mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bagley Family Photograph
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a family photo of Nancy Susan Reynolds (the woman holding the baby), with her first husband, Henry Walker Bagley. Nancy Susan Reynolds was responsible for reconstructing the Reynolds Homestead, located in Critz, VA, and subsequently donating it to Virginia Tech for preservation of the home and her familyâ€™s history. Also pictured are her three children: Nancy Jane (young girl), Smith Walker (young boy), and Susan Walker (baby).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Reynolds family
Virginia
